mapper.select: SELECT n.news_id, n.stock_id, n.stock_code, (SELECT COALESCE(s.stock_name, n.stock_code) FROM stock s WHERE s.stock_code = n.stock_code LIMIT 1) as stock_name, n.title, n.source, n.published_at, n.created_at, n.updated_at FROM news n ORDER BY n.created_at DESC

SELECT n.news_id, n.stock_id, n.stock_code, (SELECT COALESCE(s.stock_name, n.stock_code) FROM stock s WHERE s.stock_code = n.stock_code LIMIT 1) as stock_name, n.title, n.source, n.published_at, n.created_at, n.updated_at FROM news n ORDER BY n.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT n.news_id, n.stock_id, n.stock_code, (SELECT COALESCE(s.stock_name, n.stock_code) FROM stock s WHERE s.stock_code = n.stock_code LIMIT 1) as stock_name, n.title, n.source, n.published_at, n.created_at, n.updated_at FROM news n WHERE n.stock_code = #{stockCode} ORDER BY n.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT n.news_id, n.stock_id, n.stock_code, s.stock_name, n.title, n.source, n.published_at, n.created_at, n.updated_at FROM news n INNER JOIN stock s ON n.stock_code = s.stock_code WHERE s.country = #{country} ORDER BY n.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO news ( stock_id, stock_code, title, source, link, published_at, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{stockId}, #{stockCode}, #{title}, #{source}, #{link}, #{publishedAt}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT n.news_id, n.stock_id, n.stock_code, (SELECT COALESCE(s.stock_name, n.stock_code) FROM stock s WHERE s.stock_code = n.stock_code LIMIT 1) as stock_name, n.title, n.source, n.link, n.published_at, n.created_at, n.updated_at FROM news n WHERE n.news_id = #{newsId}

SELECT n.news_id, n.stock_id, n.stock_code, (SELECT COALESCE(s.stock_name, n.stock_code) FROM stock s WHERE s.stock_code = n.stock_code LIMIT 1) as stock_name, n.title, n.source, n.published_at, n.created_at, n.updated_at FROM news n WHERE n.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{category}, '%') ORDER BY n.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}

SELECT n.news_id, n.stock_id, n.stock_code, (SELECT COALESCE(s.stock_name, n.stock_code) FROM stock s WHERE s.stock_code = n.stock_code LIMIT 1) as stock_name, n.title, n.source, n.published_at, n.created_at, n.updated_at FROM news n WHERE n.title LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR n.source LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') OR n.stock_code LIKE CONCAT('%', #{keyword}, '%') ORDER BY n.created_at DESC LIMIT #{limit}
mapper.update: UPDATE news SET title = #{title}, source = #{source}, link = #{link}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE news_id = #{newsId}
